capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've noticed that the character Filch in our school's history is often portrayed as a bit of an adult in a child's world. He's always so strict and serious, it's like he's trying to be a grown-up before his time. (SENTIMENT: AMUSEMENT)

capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always been fascinated by Harry's story. He's definitely a hero who lived up to his reputation as "the boy who lived". And the way he grew up to become an amazing wizard, saving the wizarding world time and time again... it's truly inspiring.
